dbms.util
Class Table

java.lang.Object
  dbms.util.Table
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Table
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Describes the table as our DBMS knows it. It contains the name of the table, the columns that contain the fields and the primary key.

See Also:
